title: Skills
text:
PythonTableauRSPSSData Storytelling











Skilled in using popular Python libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Seaborn and Matplotlib for efficient data manipulation and visualization.
Developed predictive models and performing data clustering by leveraging Scikit-learn.
Honed data analytics skills with Python through the Google Data Analytics Certificate, focusing on collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to drive data-driven decisions.

★★★☆☆

Link to course or certificate














Improved Tableau skills in creating interactive and visually compelling dashboards to uncover insights from complex datasets.
Skilled in designing dynamic visualizations that highlight key performance indicators (KPIs), trends, and patterns, aiding in data-driven decision-making.
Sample Dashboards:  Vietnam Insurance Market | Executive Dashboard | Agency Sales Dashboard

★★★☆☆

Link to course or certificate














Skilled in using R for statistical analysis, data manipulation, and visualization. Familiar working with libraries such as dplyr, ggplot2, tidyr and Tidymodels to efficiently process, analyze, and present data.
Capable of applying R for machine learning algorithms, exploratory data analysis, and building reproducible reports, leveraging R Markdown for dynamic documents.

★★★☆☆

Link to course or certificate














Competent in using SPSS for statistical analysis, including data management, descriptive statistics, and basic inferential procedures
Capable leveraging SPSS features and functions to analyze, interpret, and present data, facilitating accurate, data-driven decision-making
Take a deep dive into using SPSS for Machine Learning and AI projects.

★★★☆☆

Link to course or certificate














Data Analysis: Skilled in breaking down complex datasets, identifying patterns, trends, and correlations to extract actionable insights.
Visual Communication: Capable in crafting compelling data narratives that clearly communicate insights and support decision-making.
Applied Business Analytics skills to drive strategic decisions by translating data into impactful business stories, turning data insights into actionable strategies through clear and persuasive storytelling.

★★★☆☆

Data Analysis certificate | Business Analytics certificate

title: Tam Pham
text:
With years of experience in Business Analysis and Project Management, I am now eager to embark on a new journey in Data Analytics. I aim to leverage my expertise in both business and data analytics to uncover insightful data stories that support stakeholders in making informed decisions.


I have been actively exploring Data Analytics and Data Science through LinkedIn Learning, Coursera, and various online resources. This learning journey has equipped me with:


General Skills: Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Preparation, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), Predictive Analytics (PRA), and Machine Learning
Technical Skills: Proficiency in IBM SPSS, R Programming, Python, and Tableau.
Machine Learning Algorithms: Knowledge of Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest, XGBoost, SVM, k-NN, and K-means Clustering.

This portfolio showcases my achievements and capabilities as I transition into a Business Analytics professional.

I am excited about the opportunity to work in Data Analytics and look forward to contributing to this dynamic field.


Tableau LinkedIn GitHub

title: Projects
text:
This page contains a list of projects that I have explored throughout the learning of Data Analytics and Data Sciences. Please check out.








    
    
                  
            Apr 12, 2023
        
        
            Insurance Policy Lapsed Prediction
            This project aims to predict the likelihood of insurance policy lapses based on Policy information, Customer demography.

The analysis is conducted using Logistic Regression in SPSS and Tree-based methods from Tidymodels framework in R.

                         Blog post
                    
                
                
            
            
        
        
            
        
    
    
    
                  
            Apr 28, 2023
        
        
            Customer Churn Prediction
            This project aims to predict customer churn using Decision Tree in SPSS and classification algorithms from Tidymodels in R.  The goal is to identify customers who are likely to leave the service and understand the factors contributing to churn."


            
            
                
                
                    
                    
                    
                         Slides
                    
                
                
                
                    
                    
                    
                         Blog post
                    
                
                
            
            
        
        
            
        
    
    
    
                  
            Jul 11, 2024
        
        
            Employee Attrition Prediction
            This project utilizes Logistic Regression and Tree-based models in Python to predict employee attrition.   It includes Exploratory Data Analysis, Predictive Analysis, and offers recommendations for improving employee retention.


            
            
                
                
                    
                    
                    
                         Slides
                    
                
                
                
                    
                    
                    
                         Blog post
                    
                
                
            
            
        
        
            
        
    
    
    
                  
            Aug 16, 2024
        
        
            Customer Segementation
            This project leverages K-means clustering in Python to segment customers based on behavior and characteristics.  The goal is to identify distinct customer groups for more effective targeted marketing strategies.
